name: Stargazer (itch) (ziccohdx)
description:
Instructions:

  • [HOLD left mouse button] - player moves towards mouse pointer position
  • [HOLD q] - shoot
  • [spacebar] - toggle healthUI on/off
  • [r] - restart (only if player ship is destroyed)
  • [m] - toggle music on/off

Here goes rundown of game features - pixel art space action shooter. Btw the difficulty ramps up with higher score. So you better destroy those ships :P.

Features:

  • asteroids (cannot be destroyed, obstacle in shooting for both enemy and player; can be passed through)
  • enemy spaceship
  • space leviathan
  • repair kit

Features possibly added later: 

  • ability to move asteroids
  • additional types of enemy ships 
  • powerup weapons
  • ability to use score to buy stuff

Any questions, critique or ideas? Leave a comment down bellow, I would love to know your opinion.
